patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,328 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout
+    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+
+    style="@style/CalculatorCommonTheme"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical">
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="0dp"
+        android:orientation="vertical"
+        android:layout_weight="0.5">
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/textViewExample"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:textSize="15sp" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="0dp"
+        android:orientation="horizontal"
+        android:layout_weight="0.7">
+
+
+        <Space
+            android:layout_width="0dp"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:layout_weight="3" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/btnSettings"
+            android:layout_width="0dp"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="@string/text_settingsButton"
+            style="@style/ButtonsStyleForSymbols"
+            android:textSize="9sp"/>
+
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="0dp"
+        android:orientation="vertical"
+        android:layout_weight="1">
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/textViewResult"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:clickable="false"
+            android:textAlignment="viewEnd"
+            android:textAllCaps="true"
+            android:textDirection="locale"
+            android:textSize="@dimen/keyTextSizeLandscape" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="0dp"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:orientation="vertical">
+
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonClear"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForClear"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+
+
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtnClear"
+                android:textSize="@dimen/keyTextSizeLandscape"
+
+                app:backgroundTint="#FFFFFF" />
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonBackSpace"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForSymbolsLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtnBackSpace" />
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonDivide"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForSymbolsLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtnDivide" />
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonMultiply"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForSymbolsLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtnMultiply" />
+        </LinearLayout>
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="0dp"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:orientation="vertical">
+
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:orientation="horizontal"
+            android:layout_weight="1">
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button7"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForNumbersLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtn7" />
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button8"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForNumbersLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtn8" />
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button9"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForNumbersLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtn9" />
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonMinus"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForSymbolsLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtnMinus" />
+
+        </LinearLayout>
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="0dp"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:orientation="vertical">
+
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:orientation="horizontal"
+            android:layout_weight="1">
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button4"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForNumbersLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtn4" />
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button5"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForNumbersLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtn5" />
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button6"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForNumbersLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtn6" />
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonPlus"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForSymbolsLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtnPlus" />
+
+        </LinearLayout>
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="0dp"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:orientation="vertical">
+
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:orientation="horizontal"
+            android:layout_weight="1">
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button1"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForNumbersLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtn1" />
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button2"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForNumbersLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtn2" />
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button3"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForNumbersLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtn3" />
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonPt"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForSymbolsLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtnPt" />
+
+        </LinearLayout>
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="0dp"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:orientation="vertical">
+
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:orientation="horizontal"
+            android:layout_weight="1">
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/button0"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForNumbersLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="5dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtn0" />
+
+            <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+                android:id="@+id/buttonEquel"
+                style="@style/ButtonsStyleForSymbolsLandScape"
+                android:layout_width="0dp"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+
+                android:layout_marginLeft="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginRight="10dp"
+                android:layout_weight="1"
+                android:text="@string/textBtnEquel" />
+
+        </LinearLayout>
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -1,18 +0,0 @@
-<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
-<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
-    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
-    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
-    android:layout_width="match_parent"
-    android:layout_height="match_parent"
-    tools:context=".MainActivity">
-
-    <TextView
-        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
-        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-        android:text="Hello World!"
-        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
-        app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent"
-        app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent"

-
-</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    style="@style/CalculatorCommonTheme"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+
+    android:orientation="vertical">
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.switchmaterial.SwitchMaterial
+            android:id="@+id/mSwitchSettings"
+            android:layout_width="0dp"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_gravity="right"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="@string/textOnSwitch"
+            android:textAlignment="viewEnd"
+            android:textAllCaps="true"
+            android:textSize="15sp" />
+
+    </LinearLayout>
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

             android:id="@+id/button3"

             android:layout_height="wrap_content"
             android:layout_weight="1"

+            style="@style/ButtonsStyleForNumbers"

-            android:id="@+id/buttonPlus"
